data.question: When does the 0xcert Crowdsale start?
data.answer:
Public Presale - July 2 17:00 CEST - July 4 05:00 PM CEST (bonus 10%)
Public Crowdsale - July 4 17:00 CEST - July 18 24:00 PM CEST (bonus 5-0%)

data.question: Is there a minimum or maximum contribution?
data.answer: Public Presale: min 1 ETH, Crowdsale: no minimum

data.question: How many ZXC tokens will be distributed?
data.answer: 250M ZXC tokens will be distributed on public offering.

data.question: How can I contribute to the 0xcert crowdsale?
data.answer: You can whitelist on our webpage to be eligible to contribute here.

data.question: Which payment methods will be accepted in the 0xcert token sale?
data.answer: ETH (From MEW, MetaMask or other personal Ethereum wallet address.)

data.question: I have been asked to verify my identity (take part in the KYC). Why do I have to do that?
data.answer: KYC is mandatory to be eligible to participate in the token distribution event.

data.question: What type of photo ID can I provide?
data.answer: You may provide a passport or a government issued ID.

data.question: I have whitelisted to the 0xcert crowdsale. Where do I send ETH?
data.answer: On the day of the sale you will be able to go on the website and use the site to submit ETH for the purchase of ZXC tokens.

data.question: How much GAS / GWEI do I have to set when contributing?
data.answer: Try 250,000 or use https://ethgasstation.info

data.question: How will I know if my contribution was successful?
data.answer: You will receive a confirmation e-mail and you can also check eth transaction https://etherscan.io if it reached our wallet as well.

data.question: What kind of wallet do I need to store the ZXC tokens?
data.answer: ZXC is ERC-20 compatible so you can store it in your ETH wallet.

data.question: When will ZXC tokens come to exchanges?
data.answer: After the crowdsale we expect exchanges to list the tokens for sale due to the popularity. Decentralized exchange IDEX might be the first one.

data.question: Will there be a lock-up on tokens sold in the Crowdsale?
data.answer: There is no lockup period for tokens. Distribution of tokens will take a week after the Crowdsale ended.

data.question: I have send funds for the Crowdsale from an exchange. What can I do?
data.answer: Please contact your wallet or exchange customer support team. In some instances, those tokens could potentially be retrieved and directed to you.

data.question: When will ZXC tokens be distributed?
data.answer: During presale, crowdsale and no later than one week after crowdsale

data.question: What is 0xcert about?
data.answer: 0xcert is an open source, permission-less protocol for validating the existence, authenticity and ownership of unique digital assets on the blockchain

data.question: How are you different from competitors?
data.answer: There are various competitors in vertical that 0xcert can tackle,although 0xcert is the first and only protocol for non-fungible tokens to this day.

data.question: What sort of partnerships are in the works?
data.answer: We are partnering up with few different companies that would like to build on top of the 0xcert protocol. Also,  since the protocol is blockchain agnostic, we are talking to a few other blockchains to implement it outside Ethereum. As of now there were already a few major partnerships with schools and universities announced (IEDC, Gea Colege, …).

data.question: Are there any particular countries that you will be reaching out to?
data.answer: No.

data.question: Will you be airdropping tokens?
data.answer: No, there is no Airdrop.

data.question: How secure is 0xcert?
data.answer: It is highly secure, only the imprint is disclosed to the public while the actual data is kept private.

data.question: What is the difference between ZXC and xcert tokens?
data.answer: One is a utility token (ERC-20) and the other one is non-fungible token (used to store data- ex. diploma, KYC..)

data.question: Do you have two tokens?
data.answer: Yes and no. We will be issuing ZXC (ERC20) tokens,but the 0xcert protocol is made to manage xcerts (ERC721, non-fungible tokens).

data.question: What is Doctrina?
data.answer: Doctrina is a company that offers online education to pharmacists and issues tons of certificates every year. It's where the idea of 0xcert was brought to life

data.question: Is using 0xcert protocol for free?
data.answer: 0xcert is a open source protocol, so it can by used by anyone for free.

data.question: Is Doctrina related to 0xcert?
data.answer: Yes, Doctrina's founders encouraged the start of 0xcert and have been supporting it since day one. Nonetheless, these are two separate companies.

data.question: What’s the underlying tech stack you used to build the protocol?
data.answer: It is built on Ethereum.

data.question: What is a non-fungible token?
data.answer: Non fungible token is unique token that carries some sort of data. Once issued it cannot be changed

data.question: How do ERC20, ERC721 and ERC981 differ?
data.answer:
The most common tokens of today's crypto economy follow the Ethereum's
ERC-20 specification. These tokens carry a price, which can be divided into
smaller amounts. One can exchange just a portion of that price for a service or
for different tokens. This is called fungibility, thus these are called fungible
Tokens. Recently, another kind of token called non-fungible tokens started getting attention in the crypto community. It all started with Cryptokitties - tradable collectibles - which set the foundation for the now accepted ERC-721 standard. Unlike ERC-20 identical tokens, which carry a price, non-fungible tokens are unique and carry some sort of data.

data.question: What is Academia and what does it have to do with 0xcert?
data.answer: It is first dapp built on top of the 0xcert protocol. Academia represents blockchain-based certificate management for academic institutions and education providers.

data.question: Are you related to 0x project?
data.answer: No. These are separate projects, although 0x was a huge inspiration to us.

data.question: Can we send from exchanges?
data.answer: No.
